title: Pitch a Story Idea at an Editorial Meeting
description: A reporter has an idea for a long-form investigative piece and needs to pitch it to their editors to get it approved.

tasks.description: Prepare a written pitch document outlining the story idea, why it's important, potential sources, and the expected timeline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a comprehensive and persuasive pitch document.

tasks.description: Present the pitch verbally to the editors during the daily editorial meeting.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly and concisely explains the story idea.

tasks.description: Answer the editors' questions about the feasibility and potential impact of the story.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully defends the story idea and gets it greenlit.
